description: Welcome to ADDITION, a collection of 87 3-bedroom plus rooftop townhomes perfectly situated between Willoughby + Willowbrook and developed by Redekop Ferrario Properties. This 3 bedroom plus flex home features a side by side garage 1,645 sqft of living space plus a 675 sqft rooftop patio and gated front yard. In the kitchen enjoy Samsung Kitchen appliances including a 36‚Äù fridge, gas range and convenient pantry. Premium features come standard including: Heat pump with air conditioning, finished gas barbecue connections and roughed-in EV car charging.
